bibl.bibl: Moseley, Henry Nottidge. 1875b. On the structure and relations of the alcyonarian Heliopora cærulea, with some account of the anatomy of a species of Sarcophyton, notes on the structure of species of the genera Millepora, Pocillopora, and Stylaster, and remarks on the affinities of certain palæozoic corals. [Read 25 November 1875.] Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society of London 166 (1876): 91–129.
